about_the_game: Your eardrums will have no regerts when it comes to the blaring roar of Music to Go POSTAL By Volume 2: POSTAL 4 Edition! As heard filling the airwaves throughout the chaotic, unruly, and bidet-filled world of POSTAL 4, Volume 2 brings you 18 POSTAL-infused tracks spanning across the metal and EDM genres to set your next POSTAL streak to!
detailed_description: Your eardrums will have no regerts when it comes to the blaring roar of Music to Go POSTAL By Volume 2: POSTAL 4 Edition! As heard filling the airwaves throughout the chaotic, unruly, and bidet-filled world of POSTAL 4, Volume 2 brings you 18 POSTAL-infused tracks spanning across the metal and EDM genres to set your next POSTAL streak to!

name: Music to Go POSTAL By Volume 2: POSTAL 4 Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 101 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 511 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The whole soundtrack can also be downloaded in .WAV format by switching over to the 'WAV Soundtrack' branch.

short_description: Your eardrums will have no regerts when it comes to Music to Go POSTAL By Volume 2: POSTAL 4 Edition, delivering 18 metal and EDM tracks as heard throughout the chaotic and bidet-filled world of POSTAL 4!
